description:
Hey Folks,

For the last 99 events, through economic ups and downs, through pandemics and Prime ministers we've absoluely loved getting the community together to talk .NET, and this event is a very special 100th event we're once again involving the community with another Lightning talks evening.

Come celebrate with us during this lightning talk event, there will be refreshments provided, and 4 lightning talks from members of our own community who have helped us grow to this wonderful point.

The speakers we will have for tonight will be :

**Stephen Shakespeare** : Adjacent possible: some lessons from reading
**Aaron Green :** Contribution: A story of hubris, learning and making friends
**Hannah Price :** Switching from .Net to Go
**Chris Stephens** : The only developer on the islands - delivering customer value with very limited resources

It's gonna be a lot of fun, we can't wait 🥳🎉

See you there 🙂
title: The 100th meetup Lightning talk special [In Person]
